messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

problem accessing two shared mailboxes info amsterdam and sent thursday march re access hello contact with told need password for mailboxes order access them can you provide with apparently way working with adding mailbox using own credentials for authentication kind regards marketing campaign manager date thursday march re access hi yammer works thank you regarding set up already have with set up need add more mailboxes but even when trying you told below gives authentication error anything can try marketing campaign manager date wednesday march re access hello could you please try instead shared mailbox address put your address when connecting for yammer try using kindly let know if works or thank you kind regards rare analyst ext hub sent wednesday march re access hello thank you but still working have have had assistance side but authentication failing attached also counts for info amsterdam cannot access problem quite urgent hinders work also something unrelated signing into yammer working for tried create sign but also gives error attached can you please help out thank you marketing campaign manager date monday february access hello please be advised we have granted access shared mailbox kindly refer attached guide for exact instructions how add shared mailbox your should any you require further assistance hesitate contact thank you kind regards rare analyst ext hub sent thursday february request assigned hello please be advised record number assigned please review details take appropriate action reference number details null choose request template if applicable add access shared mailbox please provide short description your request add access shared mailbox request details shared mailbox name provide access add requested for contact marketing address location line manager location access request please click following link kind regards ref msg

message.reasoning:
**Categorizing IT Tickets**

I'm currently analyzing the provided text to determine the best IT ticket category. My focus is on mapping the user's request to the most fitting option from the available enum: "Hardware", "HR Support", "Access", "Miscellaneous", "Storage", "Purchase", "Internal Project", and "Administrative rights."

**Focusing on Access**

I've analyzed the ticket descriptions and am confident the core issue is related to accessing shared mailboxes and authentication problems. This strongly suggests the "Access" category is the most appropriate classification. I've ruled out other options like Hardware as they don't align with the user's stated problems.

**Finalizing Access Classification**

I've thoroughly reviewed the user's requests and am confirming that "Access" is indeed the most fitting category for these IT tickets. All indicators, particularly those concerning shared mailbox authentication and retrieval, align perfectly with this classification.
